CognitiveSkills.heading: SKILLS WE DEVELOP
CognitiveSkills.subtitle: REFINEMENT OF MENTAL PROCESSES

section1.title: Samga's Online Cognitive Games
section1.text: Online cognitive games for children with special needs are more than just entertainment—they are a powerful tool for enhancing learning and development in an engaging and enjoyable way. From basic memory exercises to intricate puzzles, these interactive games offer children the opportunity to build key life skills, such as cognitive and motor abilities, at their own pace.

section2.title: Samga's Interactive Cognitive Games – A Powerful Tool for Learning
section2.text: If you're seeking interactive online cognitive games for your child, Samga's cognitive games provide a comprehensive solution. Thoughtfully designed with the needs of children with special needs in mind, these games offer more than just fun—they provide unique learning experiences that foster skill development. Explore Samga's diverse collection of cognitive games, discover how each game promotes growth, and find the perfect match for your child's needs!

section3.title: Skills Samga's Cognitive Games Help Improve in Children with Special Needs
section3.text: Samga's cognitive games for children with special needs are specifically designed to make learning both fun and impactful, while supporting the development of vital life skills in a playful, interactive environment. Here's how Samga's cognitive games promote growth in crucial areas:

skill0.title: Attention and Focus
skill0.text: Samga's cognitive games help improve children's attention span by encouraging sustained engagement with tasks. Games that require focus and perseverance help enhance their concentration skills and the ability to stay on track.

skill1.title: Critical Thinking and Decision-Making Skills
skill1.text: Samga's cognitive games provide valuable opportunities for sharpening cognitive skills like critical thinking and decision-making. Through entertaining challenges, children learn to manage problems independently and make decisions on the fly, which helps strengthen their cognitive abilities.

skill2.title: Motor Skills and Visual Perception
skill2.text: Samga's cognitive games are an excellent resource for improving movement coordination and visual responses. By engaging in various game activities, children practice coordination and visual skills in a supportive and enjoyable environment.

skill3.title: Memory Enhancement
skill3.text: Effective memory skills are essential for learning, and Samga's cognitive games aim to enhance memory in children with special needs. The interactive and fun nature of the games encourages children to retain and recall information, sharpening their memory while enjoying the process.

skill4.title: Object and Concept Recognition
skill4.text: From shapes and numbers to letters and symbols, Samga's games help children improve their object recognition skills. The hands-on, interactive approach helps children better identify and understand objects, making learning enjoyable and effective.

CognitiveSkills.conclusion: Samga's online cognitive games offer a modern, technology-driven approach to learning that empowers children with special needs to grow, learn, and succeed in a fun, interactive way.

MotoricSkills.heading: SKILLS WE DEVELOP
MotoricSkills.subtitle: IMPROVING COORDINATION AND MOVEMENT

section1.title: Samga's Motor Skills Games
section1.text: Samga's online games are designed to develop and improve motor functions in children with special needs. These games target both fine and gross motor skills, helping children to strengthen coordination, balance, and physical awareness.

section2.title: Fun Meets Physical Development
section2.text: Through interactive and fun challenges, children can practice movements such as tracing shapes, dragging objects, pressing keys, or imitating motions—supporting the development of essential motor functions in a supportive environment.

section3.title: Skills Samga's Motor Games Help Improve:

skill0.title: Fine Motor Skills
skill0.text: Activities that involve precision using fingers and hands.

skill1.title: Gross Motor Skills
skill1.text: Larger movements involving arms, legs, and body coordination.

skill2.title: Balance and Posture
skill2.text: Games that train body awareness and control.

skill3.title: Hand-Eye Coordination
skill3.text: Challenges that combine visual cues with precise actions.

skill4.title: Reaction Time
skill4.text: Stimulus-response games to improve timing and decision-making.

MotoricSkills.conclusion: These games provide an inclusive, low-pressure, and engaging way for kids to develop confidence in their physical abilities.

BalloonPop.title: Balloon Pop
BalloonPop.subtitle: Pop Balloons with Your Fingertip Using Computer Vision!
BalloonPop.description: 🎈 Welcome to Balloon Pop — an exciting gesture-based game that uses advanced computer vision technology! Using MediaPipe's hand tracking system, this game detects your index fingertip through your webcam and lets you pop colorful balloons in real-time. Experience the thrill of popping balloons without touching any device — just point and pop! The game progressively increases in difficulty as balloons move faster after each successful pop, keeping you engaged and challenged.

howToPlay.title: How to Play:
howToPlay.step1: Position yourself in front of the webcam with good lighting
howToPlay.step2: Hold up your hand where the camera can see it clearly
howToPlay.step3: Point with your index finger at the balloons on screen
howToPlay.step4: Touch the balloons with your fingertip to pop them and score points!

technology.title: Technology Behind the Game:
technology.item1: Computer Vision (CV) for real-time video processing
technology.item2: MediaPipe hand tracking to detect fingertip position
technology.item3: CVZone HandTrackingModule for precise gesture recognition
technology.item4: No mouse or keyboard needed — just your hand!

BalloonPop.skillsTitle: The skills being developed by: Balloon Pop

LetterTracing.title: Letter Tracing
LetterTracing.subtitle: Learn to Write Letters Using Hand Gestures!
LetterTracing.description: ✍️ Welcome to Letter Tracing — an innovative educational game that transforms handwriting practice into a contactless, gesture-controlled experience! Using MediaPipe's hand tracking technology, the game tracks your index finger in real-time through your webcam, allowing you to trace letter outlines in the air. Perfect for children and early learners to develop fine motor control and letter formation skills in an engaging digital environment.

howToPlay.title: How to Play:
howToPlay.step1: Position yourself in front of the webcam with your hand clearly visible
howToPlay.step2: Use your index finger as a virtual pen to trace letters
howToPlay.step3: Follow the letter outline displayed on screen
howToPlay.step4: Receive instant feedback on your tracing accuracy (90% threshold for success)

realTime.title: Real-Time Tracking
realTime.description: 21 hand landmarks tracked in 3D using MediaPipe

fingerTracking.title: Precise Finger Detection
fingerTracking.description: Index fingertip (landmark 8) serves as your virtual pen

accuracy.title: Accuracy Assessment
accuracy.description: Pixel-level overlap calculation for tracing evaluation

contactless.title: Contactless Learning
contactless.description: No physical tools needed - just your hand!

LetterTracing.skillsTitle: The skills being developed by: Letter Tracing

FruitSlicer.title: Fruit Slicer
FruitSlicer.subtitle: Slice Fruits with Your Nose Using Motion Tracking!
FruitSlicer.description: 🍓 Welcome to Fruit Slicer — an innovative game that uses nose tracking technology for a unique gaming experience! Using MediaPipe's face detection, this game tracks your nose position through your webcam, allowing you to slice fruits by moving your head. Perfect for developing motor skills, attention, and visual-motor coordination in an accessible way. The game features progressive difficulty levels and motivating sound effects to keep players engaged.

howToPlay.title: How to Play:
howToPlay.step1: Position yourself in front of the webcam with your face clearly visible
howToPlay.step2: Move your head to control the slicing cursor with your nose
howToPlay.step3: Touch the fruits with your nose position to slice them
howToPlay.step4: Avoid bombs in higher levels and score as many points as possible!

level1.title: Level 1 - Beginner
level1.description: Large, slow-moving fruits only. No bombs. Perfect for getting started!

level2.title: Level 2 - Intermediate
level2.description: Smaller fruits and bombs introduced. Be careful what you slice!

level3.title: Level 3 - Advanced
level3.description: Fast, small fruits with more bombs. Test your skills and reflexes!

technology.title: Innovative Technology:
technology.item1: Nose tracking via MediaPipe face detection
technology.item4: Accessibility for users with limited hand mobility

FruitSlicer.skillsTitle: The skills being developed by: Fruit Slicer

Tennis.title: Tennis
Tennis.subtitle: Play Virtual Tennis with Hand Movements!
Tennis.description: 🎾 Welcome to Tennis — a virtual tennis experience where you control rackets using hand movements tracked via webcam! This adaptive game helps develop hand-eye coordination and motor skills in a fun, engaging way. With bright visual elements including a colorful tennis court, animated ball, and rackets, the game creates an exciting and friendly environment suitable for children of all abilities.

howToPlay.title: How to Play:

howToPlay.step2: Move your hands to control the virtual tennis rackets
howToPlay.step3: Catch and hit the ball as it moves across the court
howToPlay.step4: Score points by successfully returning the ball!

medium.title: Medium

RockPaperScissors.title: Rock Paper Scissors
RockPaperScissors.subtitle: Battle AI with Hand Gesture Recognition!
RockPaperScissors.description: ✊✋✌️ Welcome to Rock Paper Scissors — the classic strategy game reimagined with cutting-edge computer vision technology! Using real-time hand gesture recognition, show rock, paper, or scissors to your webcam and watch as our AI instantly detects your move and responds. Experience the timeless game in a whole new way that promotes quick decision-making, pattern recognition, and strategic thinking!

howToPlay.title: How to Play:
howToPlay.step1: Position yourself in front of the webcam with good lighting
howToPlay.step2: Make your choice: Rock (fist), Paper (flat hand), or Scissors (victory sign)
howToPlay.step3: Show your gesture clearly to the camera
howToPlay.step4: The AI will detect your move and reveal its choice instantly!

Home.review1text: This platform has been a game-changer for my son. He enjoys every session, and I've seen noticeable improvement in his coordination and attention span. The characters and challenges are delightful!
Home.review2text: So pretty much the better game. It's colorful, intuitive, and my daughter is always asking to play it again. She feels included and empowered — and so do we as parents.
Home.review3text: The best game ever. It allows children with cognitive difficulties to interact, play, and grow. The learning curve is gentle and full of encouragement.
Home.review4text: My two-year-old daughter loves this because she thinks it's magical. She says she 'learns everything' through games. A fun and educational tool that we now use daily.
Home.review5text: Samga is an amazing project. I've personally seen children light up with excitement while using it. The interface is designed with care and heart.
Home.features1text: From math and literacy to science and empathy, our games spark curiosity and engage your child's intellect and emotional intelligence. Each game is designed to turn learning into an adventure — fun, meaningful, and full of discovery.
Home.features2text: We believe in the power of movement — not just for fitness, but for learning too. Our games get kids up and active, blending physical play with cognitive challenges that energize both body and brain.
Home.features3text: Our platform fosters meaningful interactions. Whether it's solving puzzles as a team or sharing creative ideas, kids build essential real-world skills like memory, focus, collaboration, and innovation — all through playful exploration.
Home.features4text: Confidence grows with every small victory. Our games celebrate effort, creativity, and individuality, empowering children to take the lead, express themselves, and feel proud of what they achieve — no matter how big or small.
Home.header_paragraph: Samga offers a gamified platform with proven exercises and materials to support children with diverse needs.
Home.card1_text: Explore playful activities that nurture learning, emotional growth, and fun.
Home.card2_text: Our games adapt to all abilities, supporting every child through joyful, accessible experiences.
Home.card3_text: Track your child's growth with instant feedback designed for parents, educators, and therapists.
Home.card4_text: Custom solutions for schools and clinics to integrate inclusive learning with outcomes.

WhoWeHelp.card_neurodivergent_text: Children with ADHD, autism, Down syndrome, and other developmental conditions benefit from therapeutic games that improve attention, social skills, and motor control — all while keeping them engaged and motivated to play and learn.
WhoWeHelp.card_earlylearners_text: Our platform supports holistic growth in young children, combining AR technology with movement and cognition-based games that enhance early literacy, numeracy, creativity, and problem-solving abilities.
WhoWeHelp.card_parents_text: Samğa provides caregivers and specialists with measurable insights, adaptive challenges, and enjoyable tools that extend therapy beyond the clinic — making learning consistent, interactive, and goal-driven at home or in care settings.
WhoWeHelp.adhd_text: Attention Deficit Hyperactivity Disorder, more commonly known as ADHD, is a neurodevelopmental disorder characterized by inattention and hyperactivity in individuals.
WhoWeHelp.adhd_intro_text: In the world of special needs education and support, it is crucial to find approaches and informational resources that help each child's unique learning style and way of engaging with the world. Samğa stands out in this area with its ADHD-sensitive game design, offering innovative and personalized solutions.
WhoWeHelp.asd_intro: Interactive Therapy and Sensory Play Games for Children with Autism
WhoWeHelp.asd_intro_text_1: Samğa offers an engaging platform that encourages children with ASD to actively participate and respond to their environment with purpose and intention by offering fun online games for Autism Spectrum Disorder.
WhoWeHelp.asd_intro_text_2: Our sensory games allow children to improve core skills such as action-reaction, hand-eye coordination, spatial awareness, and body awareness.
WhoWeHelp.asd_support_title: How Samğa helps children with Autism Spectrum Disorder (ASD):
WhoWeHelp.asd_support_text: Kids with ASD can develop vital skills crucial for daily living. Samğa motivates and supplements traditional treatments, improving communication, creativity, and joint attention.
WhoWeHelp.asd_social_skills_text: These activities ensure autistic individuals understand social cues, communicate effectively, and build new relationships with confidence.
WhoWeHelp.asd_teen_therapy_text: Creative, tailored games help teenagers build motor and communication skills, manage sensory sensitivities, and stay motivated through fun.
WhoWeHelp.asd_games_text: Samğa games are accessible for all age groups, supporting developmental needs across the autism spectrum.
WhoWeHelp.down_intro_title: Sensory Activities and Therapy Games for Kids with Down Syndrome
WhoWeHelp.down_intro_text_1: Children with Down Syndrome need help improving their fine and gross motor skills. Samğa's interactive games support them in achieving developmental goals that positively impact their daily lives.
WhoWeHelp.down_intro_text_2: Games that require hand-eye coordination help strengthen visual-motor integration, while balance-based games improve postural stability.
WhoWeHelp.down_support_title: How Samğa Helps Children with Down Syndrome:
WhoWeHelp.down_support_text_1: Samğa provides a variety of online activities that challenge cognitive abilities. Memory games assist in improving both short-term and long-term memory, and attention-based tasks enhance focus and sustained engagement.
WhoWeHelp.down_support_text_2: Games using visual and auditory aids help boost language acquisition and support clearer speech development.
WhoWeHelp.down_skill_1: Enhanced motor control, accuracy, and efficiency
WhoWeHelp.down_skill_2: Improved clarity of language and speech
WhoWeHelp.down_skill_4: Boosted cognitive performance in memory and numeracy
WhoWeHelp.dcd_intro_title: Interactive Therapy and Sensory Games for Children with Cerebral Palsy
WhoWeHelp.dcd_intro_text_1: Samğa's online games for cerebral palsy can supplement in-clinic occupational therapy for children with Cerebral Palsy. These games provide therapeutic activities for developing both gross and fine motor skills, making them an ideal addition to physical and occupational therapy.
WhoWeHelp.dcd_intro_text_2: These games are not only fun but can also be customized to suit children with varying conditions and levels of capabilities, offering a great solution for parents and therapists looking for enjoyable and effective ways to encourage motor skill development.
WhoWeHelp.dcd_support_title: How Samğa helps children with Cerebral Palsy
WhoWeHelp.dcd_support_text: Games allow adjustment of difficulty levels according to each child's ability, challenging them to expand their range of motion and improve bilateral coordination. Continued practice helps children with cerebral palsy develop upper body strength and body awareness, boosting their confidence.
WhoWeHelp.dcd_skill_1: Improve upper body muscle strength and expand range of motion
WhoWeHelp.dcd_skill_2: Enhance synchronized movements with greater precision
WhoWeHelp.dcd_skill_3: Enhance motor control, accuracy and efficiency
WhoWeHelp.dcd_skill_4: Boost cognitive performance in areas such as classification, retention and arrangement
WhoWeHelp.dcd_skill_5: Encourage and refine planning and organization of movements, and help regulate balance
WhoWeHelp.cp_intro_title: Interactive Therapy and Sensory Games for Children with Cerebral Palsy
WhoWeHelp.cp_intro_text: Samğa's online games for cerebral palsy can supplement in-clinic occupational therapy. These therapeutic activities help develop both gross and fine motor skills and can be tailored to each child's ability level.

WhoWeHelp.cp_support_text: Our games help improve bilateral coordination, expand the range of motion, and develop upper body strength. They also support children with limited mobility, including those in wheelchairs, through adaptive design.

WhoWeHelp.ece_intro_text: Early childhood is a crucial stage in a child's life, shaping cognitive, physical, and emotional development. Samğa enhances early childhood education through interactive, science-backed learning experiences using AR and AI technologies.
WhoWeHelp.ece_definition_text: ECE focuses on foundational learning and development for children from birth to around age eight, preparing them for lifelong learning.
WhoWeHelp.ece_importance_title: Why is Early Childhood Education Important?
WhoWeHelp.ece_importance_text: It lays the foundation for success, improves brain development and social adaptability, and nurtures curiosity and critical thinking.
WhoWeHelp.ece_benefit_1: Cognitive Development: Enhances memory, attention, problem-solving, and critical thinking.
WhoWeHelp.ece_benefit_2: Physical Growth: Improves motor skills, coordination, and overall physical health.
WhoWeHelp.ece_benefit_3: Social and Emotional Skills: Builds confidence, communication, and emotional regulation.
WhoWeHelp.ece_benefit_4: Special Education Support: Adapts to children's needs with inclusive game design and real-time tracking for educators and parents.

SnakeGame.title: Snake Game
SnakeGame.subtitle: Control Your Snake with Gesture Tracking!
SnakeGame.description: 🐍 Welcome to Snake Game — the classic arcade game revolutionized with computer vision technology! Using real-time hand tracking via webcam, guide your snake using only your index finger. Navigate through the grid to collect food items like virtual donuts, watch your snake grow longer, and avoid colliding with yourself. This gesture-based control system transforms the traditional Snake game into an immersive experience that develops hand-eye coordination and spatial awareness.

howToPlay.title: How to Play:
howToPlay.step1: Position yourself in front of the webcam with good lighting
howToPlay.step2: Hold up your index finger - it becomes the snake's head
howToPlay.step3: Move your finger to guide the snake toward food items
howToPlay.step4: Avoid colliding with your own snake body as it grows!

webcam.title: Webcam Capture
webcam.description: Real-time video processing tracks your movements

control.title: Finger Control
control.description: Index finger acts as the snake's head for navigation

food.title: Food Collection
food.description: Collect donuts and other items to grow your snake

collision.title: Collision Detection
collision.description: Game ends if snake collides with its own body

cv.title: Computer Vision
cv.description: Image-based position comparisons for food collection

tracking.title: Hand Tracking Module
tracking.description: Continuous fingertip coordinate tracking frame by frame

detection.title: Self-Collision Detection
detection.description: cv2.pointPolygonTest function from OpenCV for body intersection

ConstructorGame.title: Constructor
ConstructorGame.subtitle: Build, Remember, and Create with Gesture Control!
ConstructorGame.description: 🏗️ Welcome to Constructor — an innovative educational game that enhances visual memory, attention, and fine motor skills through gesture-based interaction! Using real-time hand tracking through your webcam, you'll memorize reference images and recreate them by moving objects with simple pinch gestures. Perfect for developing short-term memory, spatial reasoning, and concentration in a fun, interactive environment.

howToPlay.title: How to Play:
howToPlay.step1: Study the reference image carefully when it appears
howToPlay.step2: Use the pinch gesture (index and middle fingers) to grab objects
howToPlay.step3: Move your hand to position objects where they belong
howToPlay.step4: Release the pinch to drop objects in place and recreate the original layout

ConstructorGame.skillsTitle: The skills being developed by: Constructor

FlappyBird.title: Flappy Bird
FlappyBird.subtitle: Fly Through Pipes Using Your Arms!
FlappyBird.description: 🐦 Welcome to Flappy Bird with a twist — control the bird using your arm movements! This hands-free version uses computer vision and pose detection to track your arm positions in real-time. Raise both arms to make the bird flap upward, lower them to prepare for the next flap. Experience the classic gameplay in an entirely new, physically engaging way that promotes movement and coordination.

howToPlay.title: How to Play:
howToPlay.step1: Position yourself in front of the webcam where your upper body is visible
howToPlay.step2: Raise both arms upward to make the bird flap
howToPlay.step3: Lower your arms to reset for the next flap
howToPlay.step4: Guide the bird through gaps between pipes and avoid collisions

mechanics.title: Game Mechanics:
mechanics.item1: Real-time pose detection tracks shoulder-elbow-hip angles
mechanics.item2: Dynamic pipe generation with varying heights
mechanics.item3: Score tracking based on pipes successfully passed
mechanics.item5: Collision detection with pipes and boundaries
